resources.string: Warning: this application is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this program, or any part of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.

Your SMS message has been received on a device running Android 4.4 (KitKat or later). Incoming text SMS will be plainly visible to any person. Use the new SMS Remote Control within the latest version of Avast Mobile Security to send invisible binary SMS commands, and enable Android 4.4 mode within your Anti-Theft installation.

Your SMS message has been received on a device using the new Google Hangouts version. This causes text SMS to be plainly visible to any person. Please use Avast Mobile Security for sending commands instead of sending text SMS, and enable Android 4.4 mode within your Anti-Theft installation. The command will be performed anyways, this is just a warning.

Choose the payment method most convenient for you. Please note that license prices may slightly vary depending on the selected payment method. Price that you see on your device screen is final, no further charges apply.
Totally secure your Android device and personal data
You will be redirected to our website.
C2DM is not supported on this phone.
The C2DM sender was not recognized.
Too many applications use C2DM on the device.
Authentication of your Google account failed on the device.
Squeeze 20% more juice per charge from your phone.
Keep your device clean with a brand new, totally free, application by Avast!
Encrypt your connection with Avast SecureLine.
You are on an unsecured Wi-Fi!
Hackers could access your device. Protect your connection with Avast SecureLine.
The two-way SMS gateway was changed.
Please specify a valid SET command.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
Your Facebook password has changed. Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
This app doesn’t have permission to do this. To change permissions, try logging into the app again.
Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
Please log into this app again to reconnect your Facebook account.
Your Facebook account is locked. Please log into www.facebook.com to continue.
"New! You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
A command of this type is already active. Please wait until it is handled.
Avast Internet Control was successfully configured

To activate your license on additional devices, the Google Account you purchased your license with needs to be activated on that device. Once your Google Account is set up, install and launch any Avast product on that device and it will detect your purchased license automatically.
In the advanced installation you can install Avast Anti-Theft as hard-reset proof and choose a custom name to disguise your Avast Anti-Theft installation.
You may now choose the name of your disguised Avast Anti-Theft installation. Please choose an unsuspicious name as the name will hide Avast Anti-Theft from the eyes of any thief.
Causes the mobile phone to initiate a phone call

This command will cause the mobile phone to initiate a phone call. By using this command you can listen to what is being said at the other end of the line. The call will be hidden as much as possible. If no phone number is given this command causes the phone to call you back. If you give a phone number the phone will call the given number
Closes the Avast Anti-Theft user interface
This command will close the Avast Anti-Theft user interface.
Turns enforcement of data connectivity on/off (only available if Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device)
Turns enforcement of data connectivity on or off e.g. if you need to turn it on to enable web remote control (only available if Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device).
Causes the device to forward SMS or calls to another phone

This command will cause the mobile phone to forward SMS and/or calls to another phone. The forwarding can be cancelled by choosing the STOP FORWARD option or by launching the Anti-Theft user interface. If no phone number is given calls or SMS will be forwarded to the phone that sent the command. If you choose the silent forwarding option SMS will be silently forwarded and deleted on the original target phone. (Please note that, silent forwarding is not supported on Android 4.4)
Marks the phone as FOUND. This command disables the phone lock as well as the siren alarm.
Geofences your device based on its current location (only available if Avast Mobile Premium is installed on the target device)

Geofencing is useful for protecting your device within a set perimeter (e.g. at a restaurant or bar). Turn on the Geofence when you arrive at the location. If the device leaves the defined area without Geofencing being disabled, it will be treated as a theft event and the device will be marked as stolen, triggering all associated protection behaviors (e.g. locking your device). Only available if Avast Mobile Premium is installed on the target device.
Get calls, SMS and/or contacts from your device
Get calls, SMS and/or contacts from your device.
Launches the Avast Anti-Theft user interface
This command will launch the Avast Anti-Theft user interface on your device.
Causes Avast Anti-Theft to send up-to-date location data about the whereabouts of your mobile phone.
Locks the mobile phone. It then will not be possible to perform any more actions on the phone. The phone can be unlocked by either sending the UNLOCK command or entering the valid access code.
Marks the phone as LOST. This command initiates the same actions as a SIM card change, depending on the protection behavior settings.
Please confirm the wipe command before sending
Please enter a message to display.
Will display a message on the phone

Will display a message on the phone. However, such a message can simply be dismissed. Or use SET LOCKTEXT to create a sticky message that will be displayed when the phone is locked, then use LOCK to lock the phone and trigger the message.
Checks if the lockscreen password is entered incorrectly (only available if Avast Mobile Premium is installed on the target device)

If the Android lock-screen password is entered incorrectly more than 3 times, you can cause Anti-Theft to mark the device as lost, triggering all associated protection behaviors (like locking your device). Additionally, it is possible for Anti-Theft to take a picture of the person. Only for premium target installations.
Reboots the device (only available if Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target devices)
This command will reboot the device (only available if Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device).
Record audio on the target device (web only)
Send SMS from the target device (web only)
Will change access to the program manager or phone settings.
Enables or disables automatic enablement of GPS
Will enable or disable automatic enablement of GPS.
Changes the low battery notification setting.

Will change the low battery notification behavior. Send a low battery notification whenever your SIM card is changed or if the device is marked as lost, or always send a notification even if a valid SIM card is present.
Changes the force data connection setting (only available where Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device)
Will change the force data connection setting (only available where Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device).
Please enter the phone number of your friend
Changes the phone number of the friend
Will change the phone number of the friend. Provide a valid mobile phone number.
Hide GPS icon when tracking the device
Hide GPS icon when tracking the device (not available on Android 4.4 and above). Disable this option if your device crashes when you try to track your device.
Changes the phone lock protection behavior
Will change the phone lock protection behavior.
Will change the custom lock text.
Changes the authorization to send SMS commands
Will change the authorization to send SMS commands.
This command will change the device owner name.
The new Avast PIN must be different to the default PIN (0000).
Please enter the 4-6 digit Avast PIN that you want to set.
The new Avast PINs do not match.
The new Avast PIN must only consist of digits (0-9).
This command will change the Avast PIN. You will need to provide a PIN of 4-6 digits
The new Avast PIN is too long, please enter up to 6 digits.
The new Avast PIN is too short, please enter at least 4 digits.
Allow/disallow Anti-Theft to report SIM card changes

Allow or disallow Avast Anti-Theft to report SIM card changes to the Avast portal by SMS to notify you of new SIM phone numbers. These sent SMS may be charged at international SMS rates, depending on your location.
Report SIM card changes by SMS

"Disable Anti-Theft protection. Note that enabling Anti-Theft protection does not work through SMS commands, you'll have to use the my.avast.com account to do this. "Caution: By using this command you will completely disable the Avast Anti-Theft system thus rendering the Anti-Theft protection useless.
Changes when the siren is activated
Will change when the siren is activated.
Changes the USB debugging access (only available where Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device)
Will change the USB debugging access (only where Avast was installed in rooted mode on the target device).
Will enable or disable thorough wipe.
Activates or deactivates the phone siren. Note that this will draw attention to the thief, but will also make the thief aware that Anti-Theft is installed.
Take a picture on the target device (web only)
Unlocks the mobile phone and adds the currently inserted SIM card to the trusted SIM card list.
Deletes all data from the phone
Deletes all data from the phone. Caution: DO NOT SEND THIS COMMAND IF YOU WANT TO KEEP DATA ON THE TARGET PHONE. THIS WILL WIPE ALL DATA WITHOUT FURTHER NOTICE.
This device has a phone number
This email address is already in use at my.avast.com. Enter the password for the account or choose another email address.
We need your phone number to set up Anti-Theft properly.
The SMS Remote Control feature requires the latest version of Avast Anti-Theft to be installed on the target device.
Setting up phone Google account registration…
An error occurred while preparing the billing process (%s).
An error occurred while preparing the billing process. Please contact our support.
Your Google account credentials were deprecated and have been updated. Please try again.
An error occurred while getting data (%s).
An error occurred while getting data. Please contact our support.
An error occurred while querying license offers (%s).
An unknown error occurred while querying the license offers.
Click to consume clear all licenses (this row must NOT be visible within release builds!!)
Avast Mobile Security is too old. Please upgrade Avast Mobile Security to the most recent version.
Avast Anti-Theft is not enabled and does not accept commands because of this. Please enable Avast Anti-Theft.
Avast Anti-Theft is too old. Please upgrade Avast Anti-Theft to the most recent version.
The Android background data setting is disabled. Avast will not be able to receive messages from the web.
Warning: your hard reset proof settings backup is INVALID. After a hard reset Avast Anti-Theft may not work anymore. Please backup your settings hard reset proof again.
Warning: your hard reset proof settings backup is NOT UP TO DATE. After a hard reset your Avast Anti-Theft may not work anymore. Please backup your settings hard reset proof again.
NOT UP TO DATE diagnosis error message: %s.
Avast Mobile Backup is too old. Please upgrade Avast Mobile Backup to the most recent version.

Your device has no Google Cloud Messaging ID. It will try to automatically recover it, but an invalid Google Account could prevent the recovery. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
Your device was found on our server, but it is marked as archived. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
Warning: there is NO hard reset proof settings backup existing. After a hard reset your Avast Anti-Theft will not work anymore. Please backup your settings hard reset proof.
The mobile data connection is disabled. Avast will not work without having the mobile data setting enabled. Please enable this setting.
The diagnosis process did not find any issues.
There is no network connection active. Avast will not be able to communicate to the web.

Your device was found on our server, but it seems that background communication to our servers does not work. Please make sure your internet connection is stable, then disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
Your device was not found on our servers. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
A server error occurred when sending a message to your device. Please use the feedback button to contact our support.
Google returned an error when trying to send a message to your device. Please use the feedback button to contact our support.
There is invalid or missing data stored on our servers. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
The server delivered an invalid response. Please retry.
We got no Google Cloud Messaging ID stored on our servers. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.

"The message sent from our servers to your device has not been received. Most of the times this is a temporary issue which can easily be solved by disabling and enabling WiFi again.
We know that sometimes firewalls block ports 5228, 5229 or 5230, which are required for Google Cloud Messaging. Please contact your system or network operator to make sure this is not the case.
Another issue is that you maybe have too old Avast Anti-Theft or Avast Mobile Security versions installed, please try to upgrade all tools to their newest version.
If the problem cannot be solved, please use the feedback button to contact our support."
Your device is not registered to the Google Cloud Messaging servers. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
Waiting for test message from web (%d seconds left)…
Avast SecureLine is too old. Please upgrade Avast SecureLine to the most recent version.
There is a mistake in your account settings. Disconnect the device from your Avast account and reconnect it to fix this problem.
The Avast program version is too old. Please upgrade to the most recent version.
AVAST is now diagnosing potential account connection problems…
Let AVAST diagnose potential account connection problems and suggest solutions to fix any found problems
In the next step you will choose a name to disguise your Avast Anti-Theft installation. Avast Anti-Theft will be registered to the application manager by using that name.

You will be able to find your Avast Anti-Theft installation by this custom name. The start screen icon will look like below, it is visible until Avast Anti-Theft is ENABLED, at this time the icon will vanish.
Could not write to /system directory (%s). Retry (it is recommended to retry at least one time)?
The program file was successfully installed to the system partition. You now have to REBOOT your phone to use Avast Anti-Theft.
Avast Anti-Theft Setup is now downloading your customized installer package. Please be patient.
In the easy installation mode, Avast Anti-Theft is installed with the randomly generated application name %s.
Downloading from Google Play is the easiest way to get Anti-Theft. It has no custom name and will not be installed rooted.

EDIFY scripts depend on a special file called UPDATE BINARY. Try the binary appropriate to your operating system, however it is not guaranteed to work on every recovery system. If it does not work, try the other types one by one until you get a binary that works.
"Server '%s' wants to configure this phone to enable internet remote control."

Your current Android settings prevent installation of apps not downloaded from Google Play. Please enable installation of our app in your system settings by checking the Unknown Sources setting.

"You can use wildcards to match more than one phone number. Use '*' for any number of digits and '.' for one digit. The number must contain at least 4 digits when you use the wildcards."
Signing-up to Avast account will keep you safe and give you full control over your device(s) through web interface on my.avast.com.
Lock it or wipe the data
Signing-up to Avast account will enable you to back-up your precious data and control them through the web interface on my.avast.com.
Finds apps that are poisoning your phone/tablet with unwanted ads.
Keeps your apps and purchases private.
Photographs a thief, records his voice (access it remotely).
Backs up all your apps, music, and videos.
Tap or slide screen to learn more
"Stop your phone or tablet from being poisoned by apps' ads or unwanted messages. Premium detects and lets you uninstall them."
Keep your apps, settings and/or purchases from being public knowledge. Premium lets you password-protect any of your apps.
Having your phone or tablet stolen costs time and money, to say at least. Premium lets you photograph a thief and record his voice (access it remotely), to help get your stolen device back.

"Your phone/tablet is a big part of your life. Don't lose all your priceless personal files to something as simple as accidental damage. Premium automatically backs up all your apps, music and videos."
Remotely send SMS from the lost phone
Take pictures & audio of the intruder

The device information sent to our server conflicts with other device information in our database. Activation of the license was not allowed due to piracy considerations. Please contact support@avast.com to fix this issue.

This command is a web-only command. This means that you have to visit my.avast.com to send the command to your device. Click the button below to open my.avast.com within your web browser.
Please give a longer package name.
Disable Mark device as lost setting
Enable Mark device as lost setting

Purchasing of a license is not supported within advanced Avast Anti-Theft as for security reasons it is not listed on Google Play store. You will need to download the latest version of another Avast tool (Avast Mobile Security or Avast Mobile Backup) and purchase the license there, after purchase you may uninstall that tool again. The license will then also be valid for your advanced Avast Anti-Theft installation. Do you want to download (or upgrade) Avast Mobile Security now?

string.name: l_purchase_web
string.u: Unable to buy via Google Play? Purchase from avast.com now.

resources.string: Do you really want to delete all communication log entries?
Reboot failed (%s). Retry (it is recommended to retry at least one time)?
You already have a valid license and you want to activate it on this device? By clicking YES you will be sent back to the app main screen and a license refresh will be triggered for you.
UPDATE.ZIP was created on the SD-card. Do you want to start ROM Manager to flash Avast Anti-Theft in recovery mode?
Add files to CyanogenMod custom backup list. This will enable Anti-Theft to survive CyanogenMod ROM flashes. REQUIRES CYANOGEN MOD ROM.
Avast Anti-Theft is able to run on your phone as normal installation. Additionally it offers special root features, like making the app hard-reset proof. Please select the desired installation mode.
If you choose to install rooted, Avast Anti-Theft Setup will request super user permissions upon installation.
Will directly try to write to the system partition. DOES NOT WORK ON NAND (S-ON) PROTECTED DEVICES.

Please select your root installation method. On most phones the Direct Write method will work. However, if you are operating on NAND (S-ON) protected devices, you will need to use the Recovery Image method.
Install Avast Anti-Theft as hard-reset proof. THIS REQUIRES YOUR PHONE TO BE ROOTED.
Will generate an UPDATE.ZIP file. Only needed for NAND (S-ON) protected devices. REQUIRES CUSTOM RECOVERY IMAGE.
Please select the UPDATE.ZIP format to generate. EDIFY is for newer ROMS, if it does not work, try to use the old AMEND format instead.
Send SMS to friends upon Geofence violation
Anti-Theft Setup will now check for system dependencies that your phone needs to fulfill in order to use this tool.
The following problems need to be solved before Avast Anti-Theft can be installed. Click on a row to show more options.

UPDATE.ZIP was created on the SD-card. You are now able to remove the setup utility and to flash Avast Anti-Theft in recovery mode (e.g. by using ROM Manager).

The entered password is too short.
Phone number is not international (starts with + or 00). An international format is needed for the Avast account.
Phone number is not in a valid format.
Enter the Avast Account credentials or create a new account.
Username is not a valid email address.
Your Avast software version is too low. Please update your Avast tools before registering the device to your account.
This device is already registered with a different account. If this is on purpose, please go online and delete your device from your old account, then try again.
A server error occurred. Please try again later.
A server error occurred (%s). Please try again later.
The phone number your entered was found to be invalid. Please give a valid phone number.
Your Avast Mobile Backup installation is too old. Please update Avast Mobile Backup before registering the device to your account
Sorry, the web browser could not be started (%s).

This application version is downloaded from Google Play (simple installation) and cannot be used as rooted installation. Remove this installation and use the Avast Mobile Security advanced installation wizard to install Avast Anti-Theft rooted.
"Server '%s' will be configured to enable internet remote control of this phone."
The purchase failed. You will not be charged.
The report description must be at least %s characters long.
The email address is not valid.
An error occurred, please try again later.
The feedback was sent, thank you!

An error occurred while connecting to Google (the error code is %d). Do you maybe use 2-factor-authentication or do not have Google Drive enabled yet for your Google Account? If yes, please click the Web Method button below to use the web way of authentication.
License initialization failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
Your license has been expired already.
The submitted license was invalid. Please contact our support.
Your Google Account credentials are invalid. Please fix this issue before retrying.
You are trying to restore the subscription too often. Please try again in a few minutes.
Restoring of your subscriptions failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
Restoring of your subscriptions failed due to an identity verification issue. Please contact our support.
Querying your Google Account credentials failed, please retry in a few minutes.
There is no Google Accounts registered on your device.
It seems that differently signed Avast Suite packages are installed. All the Avast Suite packages (Anti-Theft, Mobile Security etc.) need to be signed with the same key.

You installed Avast Anti-Theft from our servers AND from Google Play. The Google Play installation has been completely disabled and will not work. Please uninstall the Google Play installation of Avast Anti-Theft.

Anti-Theft is installed rooted in /system/app. In Android 4.4 (KitKat) the system app path was changed to /system/priv-app, which leads to non-functioning root features in Anti-Theft. Please uninstall ALL Anti-Theft files from the device (e.g. by using Avast Mobile Security uninstall wizard you can find in the settings) and reinstall Anti-Theft using the newest version or move the APK file from /system/app to /system/priv-app manually. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Your Avast Mobile Security installation is too old. Please update Avast Mobile Security before registering the device to your account
No communication log entries were found.

There is not enough space available on the /system partition of your device (%1$s free, %2$s required). Free up some space by deleting unused (e.g. audio) files from the /system partition using a root file manager
By clicking \"Continue\" your PIN will be generated and sent to your secondary phone number.
By clicking \"Continue\" a login window for your Avast account will be displayed. After successful login you will be able to change your PIN.
The PIN Recovery number will be useful if you forget your PIN. In that case, a temporary PIN is sent to the Recovery number, so you can still access the application.

"You've just set the Avast PIN. We also highly recommend setting up the PIN Recovery number, which will be useful if you forget your PIN. In that case, a temporary PIN is sent to the Recovery number, so you can still access the application."
There was an error and the SMS with the temporary PIN was not sent. Please try again later.

Your new PIN has been generated and sent by SMS to your secondary phone number.

PIN (4-6 digits) for access to all Avast applications.
The PIN can contain only numbers (between 4-6 digits) because Anti-Theft launches by dialing the PIN when it is in disguised mode.
This action will disable your Avast PIN, as you need to be connected to your Avast Account and you need to have set your secondary phone number for your Avast PIN to work properly.
